title: Elden Ring: Everything You Need To Know - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.11.21
description:
The #E32021 hype continues as we break down everything from Elden Ring's reveal, talk about Ubisoft's tv show plans, and get excited about Jedi Fallen Order's next-gen update.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:50 - Housekeeping
E3 continues on! Reactions from yesterday’s Summer Games Fest Kickoff and Day of the Devs are up on Youtube. Our Gamescast reaction to SGF breaking the show down bit by bit is up.
Koch primetime reactions are happening later today. Remember we’ll be reacting to all of the big presentations all weekend long right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:51 - Elden Ring was revealed yesterday and we have some more details - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:40:05 - Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order | Next-gen Release Is Out Today - Press release
00:43:35 - Fallout 76 is Ditching Its Battle Royale Mode - Liam Wiseman @ IGN
00:38:00 -  Ad
00:52:15 - Get ready to learn more about Babylon’s Fall
00:54:40 - Ubisoft is making a bunch of shows: Announced at Geek Week
01:04:50 - Out today
01:07:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUES: Blessing and Tim
WED: Blessing & ???
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Blessing
